name: SparseIterativeStatus_t
desc: Constants that define the status of the iterative solve.

items.name: var SparseIterativeConverged: SparseIterativeStatus_t
items.desc: A status that indicates the convergence of all solutions.

items.name: var SparseIterativeIllConditioned: SparseIterativeStatus_t
items.desc: A status that indicates the operation determines the problem is sufficiently ill-conditioned that convergence is unlikely.

items.name: var SparseIterativeInternalError: SparseIterativeStatus_t
items.desc: A status that indicates an internal failure.

items.name: var SparseIterativeMaxIterations: SparseIterativeStatus_t
items.desc: A status that indicates a failure to converge one or more solutions in the maximum number of iterations.

items.name: var SparseIterativeParameterError: SparseIterativeStatus_t
items.desc: A status that indicates an error with one or more parameters.
